FuncDef: The display traffic policy interface brief command displays brief information about traffic policies configured on a specified interface or all interfaces.
CLIs: display traffic policy interface brief bridge-domain [ <bdid> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the type of an interface.
-

Specifies the number of an interface.
-

Specifies the name of an interface.
-

Specifies the id of Bridge-domain.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 16777215.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display traffic policy interface brief gigabitethernet1/0/0
<HUAWEI> display traffic policy interface brief Bridge-domain
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display traffic policy interface brief command displays the traffic policy applied to the specified interface or all interfaces in the inbound and outbound directions.
The display traffic policy interface brief bridge-domain command displays the traffic policy applied to the specified BD domain or all BD domains.
